column4: When I first got the laptop it worked fine, a few years ago ..got virused, formatted, tried to reinstall but the default drivers from Acer wouldn't work. I was never able to find a driver so I picked up the trend net onw
ipw2200 works perfectly, just install the firmware and load the module
no, just install the firmware with apt-get if you don't have it already, and then modprobe ipw2200
